Package src.domain.bitmap

Class BitMap

java.lang.Object
src.domain.bitmap.BitMap
public class BitMap extends Object
BitMap is a 2-dimensional array representing a map of bits

      public int allocateSlot() throws BitMapPositionAlreadySetException, BitMapNextFitNotFoundException

      an index in the bitmap that has been set
      Throws:
      BitMapPositionAlreadySetException
      BitMapNextFitNotFoundException

    • findNextFit

      private int findNextFit() throws BitMapNextFitNotFoundException
      findNextFit() implements the next fit rule for finding an available position in the bitmap
      Returns:
      an index for an available position in the bitmap
      Throws:
      BitMapNextFitNotFoundException - if there is no position available

    • setBitAtPosition

      Throws:
      BitMapPositionAlreadySetException - if the position is already set

      unsets (define as 0) a bitmap position
      Throws:
      BitMapPositionAlreadyUnsetException - if the position is already unset
